name: Tableau Vivant
summary: Inspired by Victorian paper peepshows, often thought to be early iterations of VR, and drawing on the history of the Tableau Vivant, Displace Studio alongside Loughborough University students have created a snapshot in time - a living picture - that uses modern technologies such as Volumetric Capture and 3D Scanning to digitise the student performers and capture University locations to create a Virtual Reality Tableau.
